message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY

Reasoning: The paper proposes a new algorithm for the thresholding bandit problem, which is a subfield of reinforcement learning. The paper also discusses the theoretical analysis of the proposed algorithm and conducts extensive simulation experiments to validate its performance. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper also involves information theory (cs.IT) and control systems (cs.SY) to some extent, which makes them less likely but still possible sub-categories.
